error_details.explanation: Input Misrepresentation The value 'sale_price' (value: 140) was used instead of the amount Asia saved (value: 210).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 14000
Asia saved $350 - $140 = $<<350-140=210>>210 on the dress.
That means she saved $140 / $350 = <<140/350=0.4>>0.4 or 40% off on the dress.
